review_text: So good, so convenient to use! Very usefull!!!
This app has no English support even though they mentioned it's avb.
Please update. Using F@st Mobile till 2018.

Hi Team, I believe that you are having serious bugs or technical issues. I have an online saving ended on 01.07.2020 and it is supposed to be automatically renewed to the next cycle. However, now when it comes to 02.07.2020 already, it still shows the expired period of that saving. I tried to manually close the saving on 01.07.2020 many times yet the system did not let me do so with a notification saying that the system would automatically proceed the action. The prevention keeps going on. Previously, I had had the same issue for another saving ended on 30.06.2020 at the very first hours of the day, then it worked as normal around 9AM.
Error Page Exception SRVEO260E: The server cannot use the error page specified for your application to handle the Original Exception printed
But not so Tech *** bad request 100400****
I use Iphone 13 Pro Max, it seems your app is not authenticate by Face Id
